page.title: 12BUILDINGS IN NORTH YATE
page.content: The oldest houses in the area are about 300 years old. The newest were built on an estate about a year ago. The majority of people have moved into their present house within the last fifteen years. Most people like the area they live in because it is quiet, and they prefer the countryside. Feelings are mixed about Yate Shopping Centre. Some people like it, while others find it insufficient for their needs. On the whole, people buy clothes, everyday goods, and do-it- yourself items in Yate, and go to Bristol for furniture and more expensive clothes. Not many people shop in Bath. A lot of people are worried about the way Yate is growing so fast. They think that the industrial pollution from the factories on the trading estate will spoil the environment.
